https://tmrev.io/movie/439037-A Little More, A Little Less 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tTYAztuvQmsLBpmlrKwLCkeesi5.jpg "A Little More A Little Less" is a simple, low-budget and no voice-over documentary. Images of São Paulo from above and pictures invite us to a trip that shows,as the directors put it, that one’s pain is a tragedy, and the death of millions, a statistic. A Little More, A Little Less
